title: AMD security advisory (AV26-169)
description: On February 24, 2026, AMD published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: AMD Athlon and AMD Ryzen Processors  multiple models and versions
AMD Ryzen Embedded Processors  multiple models and versions
AMD EPYC and AMD EPYC Embedded Series Processors  multiple models and versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
